div.p: This element, contained in the OrlandoHeder, potentially provides information about the availability of a text, including restrictions on use, distribution, or copyright status. It could be placed anywhere in the textbase, but is currently not used by the Orlando Project. A hold-over from the TEI Header, this element refers to texts that are transcribed as electronic editions. It has one attribute, Status, with values of free (ie the text is freely available), unknown, and restricted.
